price: Had your Lord willed, all those on earth would have believed altogether. Will you then compel people to become believers?
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَأٓمَنَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ أَفَأَنتَ تُكۡرِهُ ٱلنَّاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka laāmana man fī al-arḍi kulluhum jamīʿan afa-anta tuk'rihu al-nāsa ḥattā yakūnū mu'minīna
